inclusion.criterion: Patient with breast cancer bone metastasis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: with a progression of bone metastasis (group 3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient not opposing the use of its data
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with an uncontrolled diabetes (fasting glucose < 1.6 g / l)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with a pace-maker or another material incompatible with the MRI 3 Tesla
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Movement disorders (Parkinson disease, etc.) or dementia
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be treated with Bisphosphonate.
